mapper.insert: INSERT INTO snsReply ( snsNo, userNo, snsReplyContent ) VALUES ( #{snsNo}, #{userNo}, #{snsReplyContent} );
mapper.select: SELECT s.snsNo, s.snsReplyNo , s.userNo, s.snsContent,s.snsReplyCreateTime, s.snsReplyUpdateTime, u.userNickname, u.userProfileImage FROM snsReply s, user u WHERE s.userNo = u.userNo AND snsNo = #{snsNo};
